wikipedia_page.main: Raymond John Carter (17 September 1935 – 2 July 2020) CBE was a Labour Party politician, who served as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Birmingham Northfield from 1970 to 1979. From 1980 to 2003, he was executive at the Marathon Oil Company, for whom he was also a director from 1983 to 2003.

response: At the 1979 general election, on his second attempt, Cadbury was elected Member of Parliament for Birmingham Northfield, defeating Labour incumbent Raymond Carter. It was one of the Conservatives' best and most surprising results in that election, as a Labour majority of 10,597 was overturned into a Conservative one of 204 on a 10.2% swing.
* Raymond Carter (British politician) (1935–2020), British Labour Party politician
